Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the wrapping method of a KeyWrappingSpecification struct.
        """
kwargs = {'wrapping_method': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Wrapping method must be a WrappingMethod enumeration.', objects.
    KeyWrappingSpecification, **kwargs)
args = objects.KeyWrappingSpecification(), 'wrapping_method', 0
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError,
    'Wrapping method must be a WrappingMethod enumeration.', setattr, *args)
